org.flixel.system.preloaderHelpers.PxBitmapFont

type
class
Holds information and bitmap glpyhs for a bitmap font.

Static Variables

private ZERO_POINT : nme.geom.Point

private _storedFonts : Hash<PxBitmapFont>

Static Methods

public fetch(pHandle : String) : PxBitmapFont

Retrieves a font previously stored.
Parameters:
pHandle - Identifier of font to fetch.
Returns:
Stored font, or null if no font was found.

public store(pHandle : String, pFont : PxBitmapFont) : Void

Stores a font for global use using an identifier.
Parameters:
pHandle - String identifer for the font.
pFont - Font to store.

Constructor

public new(pBitmapData : nme.display.BitmapData, pLetters : String)
Creates a new bitmap font using specified bitmap data and letter input.
Parameters:
pBitmapData - The bitmap data to copy letters from.
pLetters - String of letters available in the bitmap data.

Instance Variables

private _colorTransform : nme.geom.ColorTransform

private _glyphString : String

private _glyphs : Array<nme.display.BitmapData>

private _matrix : nme.geom.Matrix

private _maxHeight : Int

private _point : nme.geom.Point

public numLetters(get_numLetters,null) : Int

Returns number of letters available in this font.

Instance Methods

public dispose() : Void

Clears all resources used by the font.

public getFontData() : String

Serializes font data to cryptic bit string.
Returns:
Cryptic string with font as bits.

public getFontHeight() : Int

Returns height of font in pixels.
Returns:
Height of font in pixels.

public getPreparedGlyphs(pScale : Float, pColor : Int) : Array<nme.display.BitmapData>

public getTextWidth(pText : String, ?pLetterSpacing : Int, ?pFontScale : Float) : Int

Returns the width of a certain test string.
Parameters:
pText - String to measure.
pLetterSpacing - distance between letters
pFontScale - "size" of the font
Returns:
Width in pixels.

public get_numLetters() : Int

public prepareBitmapData(pBitmapData : nme.display.BitmapData, pRects : Array<nme.geom.Rectangle>) : nme.display.BitmapData

public render(pBitmapData : nme.display.BitmapData, pFontData : Array<nme.display.BitmapData>, pText : String, pColor : UInt, pOffsetX : Int, pOffsetY : Int, pLetterSpacing : Int, ?pAngle : Float) : Void

Renders a string of text onto bitmap data using the font.
Parameters:
pBitmapData - Where to render the text.
pText - Test to render.
pColor - Color of text to render.
pOffsetX - X position of thext output.
pOffsetY - Y position of thext output.

private setGlyph(pCharID : Int, pBitmapData : nme.display.BitmapData) : Void
